headline: Here’s what you would need to know about the equity market this summer
summary: Investing.com -- Raymond James said the summer rally in global equities was underpinned by “Goldilocks” economic conditions, but warned that the three pillars, low oil prices, declining Treasury yields, and steady labour markets, “will be tested post-Labor Day.”
